name: getcountriesbycontinent
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool world_population.
Tool description: Get interesting information about countries' population
API description: Fetch data about countries in a specified continent from the RapidAPI world population service.

continent.description: The name of the continent for which to fetch countries' data.

rank.description:
Order the countries according to the rank. Can take two values:

- 1 = ascending order

-  -1 = descending order
